endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of properties managed by the service.
Add a new property to the management system.
View the maintenance schedule for a specific property.
Create a new maintenance task for a specified property.
Update an existing maintenance task's details.
Remove a maintenance task from the system.
Retrieve a catalog of available service providers.
Add a new service provider for maintenance collaboration.
Assign a maintenance task to a specific service provider.
Check the status of a specific maintenance task.
